tracks.text: At night, a woman in a nightgown walks out the front door of a large, white mansion.
Text appears, "Raising Hell", "Starring Kesha"
The woman walks down steps between marble cherub statues.
The thin, white woman has waist length blond hair. She looks up, then drops her head, and taps her fingers.
Artifacts appear in our view, and we cut to an old TV.
On the TV, Kesha, the blond woman, stands in front of a cross, wearing a hot pink suit. She spreads her arms and people approach her. She places a hand on their faces.
Text on the TV reads K Network. 1 855 KeshaSavs. The first 100 callers get a free blessing.
In a church, Kesha stands at a pulpit, while a choir dances behind her.
She runs her hands over her curves and poses. A man in a brown suit sits off stage. He frowns and crosses his arms.
Kesha stares at herself in a mirror, with tussled hair. A tear runs down her cheek.
On TV, Kesha holds a book and waves, sitting in front of a marble fireplace.
Kesha wipes a tear while sitting in a church closet turned dressing room. The man in the brown suit enters, holding a glass in his hand. He shouts and points at her.
She stands and faces him. He slaps her face.
Kesha dances on stage in the church. Congregants clap and lift their hands.
Kesha places a hand on a woman, who faints. She repeats with 2 others.
Kesha stands, hands up, in front of several people on the ground. The man frowns offstage.
Kesha sits in a bubble bath. The luxurious garden tub has golden fixtures and is surrounded by marble.
On TV, Kesha twitches, rubbing her lips.
She unbuttons her shirt and bends forward, highlighting her cleavage.
In the bathtub, she looks at her hot pink nails.
In a large, white house, Kesha looks at herself in an ornate mirror.
She smiles on TV. She stares blankly at the mirror.
She looks down at her vanity, covered in makeup, with a picture of Kesha smiling in a wedding dress. Obscured behind her is the man, also in white.
Kesha walks across a white marble floor, past a baby grand piano. The room is white; the furniture is white and gold.
Wearing a revealing light pink robe, she approaches her husband. He sits on a blue and silver couch, staring forward, drinking a scotch.
She sits next to him. He continues to stare forward.
She climbs in his lap. He pushes her away.
She touches his shoulder. He grabs her throat and stands.
He presses her against a wall. She mouths a syllable beginning with S.
A flower vase falls and breaks on the floor.
She pushes her husband. He falls and she freezes.
He lies in a pool of blood.
Kesha screams "Fuck."
In low resolution, Pink and yellow flowers sit around a pure white seat, in front of a fireplace. It's Kesha's TV set.
The body lies, wrapped in a sheet, soaking blood around the head. Kesha sits on the piano bench, staring at the floor.
Kesha drags the body, leaving a trail of blood. As dawn breaks, she drags the body down the front stairs of the mansion.
She stares down at a trunk, headlights casting her body in red.
Lightning crashes overhead. She stares inside the trunk, then closes the lid.
Kesha, wearing a light blue shirt, with wet brown hair, stares into a mirror.
The sink pours water of a basin of cut hair.
On the TV, Kesha raises her hands. The TV sits in front of window blinds.
Opposite the TV, Kesha sits in a small bed, drinking. Outside the window reads a neon sign, Motel. The sign cats a red glow over Kesha.
She stares at the TV. On TV, she smiles, raising a hand to the sky.
Kesha, wearing a floral scarf and red cardigan, drives down a country road. She turns sharply. Sheriffs pursue.
A TV displays a car chase, with a smiling Kesha labelled as "Wanted".
A family in a living room watch intently.
A sheriff brandishes a gun. We watch up close as Kesha gets out of the car, hands up.
She's pushed against the hood of a car. She stares at us, mascara running. She blows a kiss. We pull back out of the car, and the door closes on her.
Cut to black. Directed by Luke Gilford.
